summary: Federal agencies can tap an array of incentives when they need to recruit or retain experts in cyber security, engineering, or some other in-demand field. Seven special payment authorities allow agencies to pay higher wages, help pay off student loans, and offer other incentives. We found that less than 6% of employees received special payments. Agencies reported that incentives were helpful, but few documented their...
title: Federal Pay: Opportunities Exist to Enhance Strategic Use of Special Payments
